proposal: Hey Wormhole community! 🚀 With your impressive network of hundreds of companies, you're truly the Web of Web3. Congrats on having 38 holders in the ETH network! Ever thought about expanding your universe with a DEX or a blockchain-based lottery? It's not rocket science, anyone from the community can deploy. Let's weave these tools into your web and see how far we can stretch it! 🕸️🌐
